featured.title: Wedding Invitations on a Budget
featured.description: With the average cost of wedding invitations in the UK ranging from £250 - £500, many couples are going down alternative routes to find more budget-friendly options.

other_blogs.title: Styles of Greeting Cards
other_blogs.description: Ever confused about the different types of greeting cards out there? Or perhaps you're interested in making your own, and want to get some new inspiration.

other_blogs.title: Wedding Stationery Inspiration
other_blogs.description: Wedding stationery designs and trends which are proving popular for 2021 and 2022 weddings.
